TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AsyncCompletedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 MethodName 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the *MethodName* event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你使用的是实现[基于事件的异步模式概述](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md)的类, 则类将提供一个*方法名称*`Completed`事件。If you are using a class that implements the [Event-based Asynchronous Pattern Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md), the class will provide a *MethodName*`Completed` event. 如果将委托的实例添加到事件中, 则将在相应的事件处理程序方法的参数中收到异步操作结果的相关信息。If you add an instance of the delegate to the event, you will receive information about the outcome of asynchronous operations in the parameter of the corresponding event-handler method. 客户端应用程序的事件处理程序委托可以检查属性来确定异步任务是否已取消。The client application's event-handler delegate can check the property to determine if the asynchronous task was cancelled. 客户端应用程序的事件处理程序委托可以检查属性, 以确定是否在执行异步任务期间发生了异常。The client application's event-handler delegate can check the property to determine if an exception occurred during execution of the asynchronous task. 如果类支持多个异步方法或对同一个异步方法的多个调用, 则可以通过检查属性的值来确定引发*方法名称*`Completed`事件的任务。If the class supports multiple asynchronous methods, or multiple calls to the same asynchronous method, you can determine which task raised the *MethodName*`Completed` event by checking the value of the property. 你的代码需要跟踪这些标记 (称为任务 Id), 因为它们对应的异步任务会开始和完成。Your code will need to track these tokens, known as task IDs, as their corresponding asynchronous tasks start and complete. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用跟踪异步操作的生存期。The following code example demonstrates using an to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#12)]

para.span: 遵循基于事件的异步模式的类可以引发事件, 以通知客户端有关挂起的异步操作的状态。

span.span: Classes that follow the Event-based Asynchronous Pattern can raise events to alert clients about the status of pending asynchronous operations.

para.span: 如果类提供*方法名称*事件, 则可以使用来告知客户端有关异步操作的结果。

span.span: If the class provides a *MethodName* event, you can use the to tell clients about the outcome of asynchronous operations.

para.span: 你可能想要与客户端进行有关异步操作结果的详细信息。

span.span: You may want to communicate to clients more information about the outcome of an asynchronous operation than an accommodates.

para.span: 在这种情况下, 你可以从类派生你自己的类, 并提供附加的私有实例变量和对应的只读公共属性。

span.span: In this case, you can derive your own class from the class and provide additional private instance variables and corresponding read-only public properties.

para.span: 如果操作被取消或发生错误, 则在返回属性值之前调用方法。

span.span: Call the method before returning the property value, in case the operation was canceled or an error occurred.

related.span: 实现基于事件的异步模式

span.span: Implementing the Event-based Asynchronous Pattern

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示异步操作是否已被取消。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether an asynchronous operation has been canceled.

value.span: 如果后台操作已被取消，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the background operation has been canceled; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性为`true`时, 异步操作中断。 When the property is `true`, the asynchronous operation was interrupted. 客户端应用程序的事件处理程序委托应该在访问派生自的类中的任何属性之前检查属性; 否则, 如果异步操作为, 则属性将引发。中断.The client application's event-handler delegate should check the property before accessing any properties in a class derived from ; otherwise, the property will raise an if the asynchronous operation was interrupted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用跟踪异步操作的生存期。The following code example demonstrates the using an to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#12)]

para.span: 如果在派生类中提供只读属性, 请确保调用方法。

span.span: If you provide read-only properties in a derived class, be sure to call the method.

para.span: 这会阻止客户端访问由于异步操作中的错误而可能无效的属性。

span.span: This prevents clients from accessing properties that are potentially not valid due to a failure in the asynchronous operation.

related.span: 实现基于事件的异步模式

span.span: Implementing the Event-based Asynchronous Pattern

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示异步操作期间发生的错误。

span.span: Gets a value indicating which error occurred during an asynchronous operation.

value.span: 如果异步操作期间发生错误，则为 实例；否则为 。

span.span: An instance, if an error occurred during an asynchronous operation; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在异步操作过程中引发了异常, 则类会将异常分配给属性。If an exception is raised during an asynchronous operation, the class will assign the exception to the property. 客户端应用程序的事件处理程序委托应该在访问派生自的类中的任何属性之前检查属性; 否则, 属性将引发 , 其属性保存对的引用。The client application's event-handler delegate should check the property before accessing any properties in a class derived from ; otherwise, the property will raise a with its property holding a reference to . 如果操作已取消 , 则`null`属性的值为。The value of the property is `null` if the operation was canceled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用跟踪异步操作的生存期。The following code example demonstrates using an to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#12)]

para.span: 如果在派生类中提供只读属性, 请确保在属性实现中调用方法。

span.span: If you provide read-only properties in a derived class, be sure to call the method in your property implementation.

para.span: 这会阻止客户端访问由于异步操作中的错误而可能无效的属性。

span.span: This prevents clients from accessing properties that are potentially not valid due to a failure in the asynchronous operation.

summary.span: 如果异步操作失败，则引发用户提供的异常。

span.span: Raises a user-supplied exception if an asynchronous operation failed.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在派生类属性中使用。The following code example demonstrates using in derived class properties. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#6)]

span.span: The property is .

exception.span: 该 属性已由异步操作设置。

span.span: The property has been set by the asynchronous operation.

exception.span: 属性持有对 的引用。

span.span: The property holds a reference to .

para.span: 如果已从类派生自己的类, 只读属性应在返回属性值之前调用方法。

span.span: If you have derived your own class from the class, your read-only properties should call the method before returning the property value.

para.span: 如果组件的异步辅助代码将异常分配给属性或将属性设置为, 则当客户端尝试读取其值时, 属性将引发异常。

span.span: If the component's asynchronous worker code assigns an exception to the property or sets the property to , the property will raise an exception if a client tries to read its value.

para.span: 这会阻止客户端访问由于异步操作中的错误而可能无效的属性。

span.span: This prevents clients from accessing properties that are potentially not valid due to a failure in the asynchronous operation.

summary.span: 获取异步任务的唯一标识符。

span.span: Gets the unique identifier for the asynchronous task.

value.span: 唯一标识异步任务的对象引用；如果未设置任何值，则为 。

span.span: An object reference that uniquely identifies the asynchronous task; otherwise, if no value has been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果类支持多个异步方法或多次调用单个方法, 则可以通过检查属性的值来确定引发*方法名称*`Completed`事件的任务。If a class supports multiple asynchronous methods, or multiple invocations of a single method, you can determine which task raised the *MethodName*`Completed` event by checking the value of the property. 你的代码需要跟踪这些标记 (称为任务 Id), 因为它们对应的异步任务会开始和完成。Your code will need track these tokens, known as task IDs, as their corresponding asynchronous tasks start and complete. 此属性的值是在对启动任务的异步方法的原始调用期间设置的。The value of this property is set during the original call to the asynchronous method that started the task. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用跟踪异步操作的生存期。The following code example demonstrates using an to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#12)]
